info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 2:29PM CST until January 02 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LITTLE RIVER AND CENTRAL SEVIER COUNTIES... At 228 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Dierks to Lockesburg to near Ben Lomond to Richmond, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashdown, Lockesburg, Wilton, Ben Lomond, Richmond, Oak Grove, Lebanon, Silver Ridge, Provo, Pine Prairie and Bellview. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
